descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Nikola Jokic finds Aaron Gordon streaking down the court on the break for an and-1 layup through contact to give the Nuggets a 69-61 lead in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic finds Gordon on the break for and-1 bucket) 2021/05/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic finds Gordon on the break for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Facundo Campazzo gets crafty as he nutmegs CJ McCollum to connect with a cutting Nikola Jokic for the easy finish inside.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Campazzo finds Joker with nutmeg pass) 2021/05/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Campazzo finds Joker with nutmeg pass
